items.summary: Replace the current GIF-based fullscreen loader with a custom, lightweight, flat-vector animation for Agrigence: a closed book appears, opens smoothly, soil appears in the center crease, a sprout emerges, then grows into a healthy plant with 3â€“4 leaves, all centered on a clean white background with a soft shadow and a green agriculture color theme.

Implement a smooth fade-out transition from the preloader into the website content: once the animation completes (or the app is ready), the preloader should fade out and then unmount without causing layout shift or interaction issues.

Ensure the preloader is performance-friendly and does not negatively affect perceived page load speed: keep the implementation small (no large raster animations), avoid unnecessary timers/work on the main thread, and minimize re-renders during the animation.
